statements.statement: SELECT PRC.LINE_CD LineCd, LIN.LINE_SHORT_NM LineShortNm, PRC.PROCESS_CD ProcessCd, PRC.PROCESS_NM ProcessNm, PRC.SEARCH_TARGET_FLG SearchTargetFlg FROM ( SELECT PR0.LINE_CD, PR0.PROCESS_CD, PR0.PROCESS_NM, PR0.GENERAL_PATTERN_CD, PR0.SEARCH_TARGET_FLG, PR0.DISPLAY_ODR FROM TM_PW_TRC_PROCESS PR0 WHERE PR0.GENERAL_PATTERN_CD = #productKind# AND PR0.TRC_DISPLAY_FLG = 1 AND PR0.SEARCH_TARGET_FLG = 0 UNION SELECT PR1.LINE_CD, PR1.PROCESS_CD, PR1.PROCESS_NM, PR1.GENERAL_PATTERN_CD, PR1.SEARCH_TARGET_FLG, PR1.DISPLAY_ODR FROM TM_PW_TRC_PROCESS PR1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT LINE_CD, PROCESS_CD FROM TM_PW_TRC_WORK WHERE COLLECTION_FLG = 1 AND TRC_DISPLAY_FLG = 1 ) WRK ON PR1.LINE_CD = WRK.LINE_CD AND PR1.PROCESS_CD = WRK.PROCESS_CD WHERE PR1.GENERAL_PATTERN_CD = #productKind# AND PR1.TRC_DISPLAY_FLG = 1 AND PR1.SEARCH_TARGET_FLG = 1 ) PRC INNER JOIN TM_PW_TRC_PROCESS_CLASS PCL ON PRC.LINE_CD = PCL.LINE_CD AND PRC.PROCESS_CD = PCL.PROCESS_CD AND PRC.GENERAL_PATTERN_CD = PCL.GENERAL_PATTERN_CD AND PCL.ASSEMBLY_PATTERN_CD = #assemblyPatternCd# LEFT JOIN TM_CC_LINE LIN ON PRC.LINE_CD = LIN.LINE_CD AND LIN.PLANT_CD = '28' AND LIN.DISPLAY_ORDER4 != 0 AND (SYSDATE BETWEEN LIN.APPLY_START_DT AND LIN.APPLY_END_DT) ORDER BY LIN.DISPLAY_ORDER4, PRC.DISPLAY_ODR
